name: Toddler Program
description: The Toddler program provides a balanced day with healthy food and naps in a home-like environment. Additionally the program offers children the room to climb, swing and move their growing bodies. Caregivers are sensitive to the toddler’s first exploration as an individual. In collaboration with parents, we build the foundation for the “Trusting Twos”.

howToGetIt: To apply for Private Pay or Subsidized Childcare at either FranDelJA location, please contact us our administrative office, at 415-822-1699.
cost: This is a fee based service
